::Pyro/Dark One::

Pyro laughs as he hears Tavatron speak, "We, my dear bot, are in the torture 
chambers!" he says, evil in his voice. He begins to drag Tavatron to one of 
the tables.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark One looks around. Seeing some not containment devices up on the wall, he 
begins to walk toward it, dragging Iron Raptor with him.
